    public class NameUsageSearchServiceImpl
extends org.gbif.common.search.service.SolrSearchSuggestService<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchResult,org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchParameter,NameUsageSolrSearchResult,org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchRequest,org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSuggestRequest>
implements org.gbif.api.service.checklistbank.NameUsageSearchService
    Checklist Bank Search interface implementation using Solr/lucene. This class uses a remote to interact with CLB index.
